locations.name: The Catacombs of Paris
locations.description: An underground ossuary in Paris, France, which holds the remains of more than six million people.

locations.name: The Door to Hell
locations.description: A natural gas field in Derweze, Turkmenistan, which has been burning continuously since 1971.

locations.name: The Island of the Dolls
locations.description: A small island in Xochimilco, Mexico, which is home to hundreds of dolls hanging from trees and buildings.

locations.name: Airplane
locations.description: A vehicle designed for air travel that is powered by jet engines or propellers.

locations.name: Mountain
locations.description: A large natural elevation of the earth's surface rising abruptly from the surrounding level; a large steep hill.

locations.name: Bus
locations.description: A large motor vehicle carrying passengers by road, typically one serving the public on a fixed route and for a fare.

locations.name: Grandma's place
locations.description: A place where your grandmother lives.
